Uses of Class
editor.TextContents

    • Uses of TextContents in editor

      Methods in editor with parameters of type TextContents 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected void UpCaseAction.changeText(TextContents con, int start, int end)
      Convert the text in a given range of the document to upper case.
      protected abstract void TextAction.changeText(TextContents con, int start, int end)
      Perform some appropriate change on a selected region of text; subclasses must implement this method.
      protected void DownCaseAction.changeText(TextContents con, int start, int end)
      Convert the text in a given range of the document to lower case.
      protected void DeleteAction.changeText(TextContents con, int start, int end)
      Delete the selected region of text.
      protected void CapitalizeAction.changeText(TextContents con, int start, int end)
      Capitalize the text in a given range of the document -- that is, capitalize each "word" (string of letters or digits).
